code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Skills(){const skillGroups=[{title:'Frontend',skills:['React.js','HTML5','CSS3','JavaScript','Tailwind CSS'],color:'border-blue-500'},{title:'Backend & DB',skills:['Python','PHP','MySQL'],color:'border-green-500'},{title:'Tools & Platforms',skills:['Git','GitHub','Netlify','Firebase'],color:'border-yellow-400'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"skills",className:"bg-black text-white py-20 px-6 md:px-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-12 decoration-green-400",children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-10 md:grid-cols-3",children:skillGroups.map((group,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`bg-gray-900 rounded-2xl p-6 border-l-8 ${group.color} shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition duration-300`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-4 text-white",children:group.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-3",children:group.skills.map((skill,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-gray-800 text-white border border-gray-700 px-4 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-700 transition",children:skill},idx))})]},index))})]});}export default Skills;
